/* VerRecvMapper.selectStoreList */
SELECT tcpvs.VER_SER_NO, tcpvs.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, tcpvs.POS_NO, tcpvs.VER_RECV_FG, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tcpvs.VER_RECV_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS VER_RECV_DT, tcpvs.POS_IP, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tcpvs.REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DT, tcpvs.REG_ID, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tcpvs.MOD_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MOD_DT, tcpvs.MOD_ID
FROM TB_CM_POS_VERSN_STORE tcpvs, TB_MS_STORE tms WHERE tcpvs.VER_SER_NO = #{verSerNo} AND tms.STORE_CD = tcpvs.STORE_CD
AND tcpvs.VER_RECV_DT IS NOT NULL
AND tcpvs.VER_RECV_DT IS NULL
ORDER BY tcpvs.STORE_CD

/* VerRecvMapper.selectStoreDtl */
SELECT tms.STORE_CD, tcpvs.POS_NO, tcpvs.VER_SER_NO, tcpv.VER_SER_NM, tcpvs.VER_RECV_FG, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tcpvs.REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tcpvs.VER_RECV_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS VER_RECV_DT, tcpvs.POS_IP, tcpv.FILE_DESC FROM TB_MS_STORE tms, TB_CM_POS_VERSN_STORE tcpvs, TB_CM_POS_VERSN tcpv WHERE tms.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tcpvs.STORE_CD = tms.STORE_CD AND tcpv.VER_SER_NO = tcpvs.VER_SER_NO ORDER BY tcpv.REG_DT DESC, tcpvs.REG_DT DESC, tcpvs.VER_RECV_DT DESC

/* VerRecvMapper.selectVerStoreDtlList */
SELECT tcpvs.VER_SER_NO, tcpvs.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, tcpvs.POS_NO, tcpvs.VER_RECV_FG, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tcpvs.REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tcpvs.VER_RECV_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS VER_RECV_DT, tcpvs.POS_IP
FROM TB_CM_POS_VERSN_STORE tcpvs, TB_MS_STORE tms WHERE tcpvs.VER_SER_NO = #{verSerNo} AND tms.STORE_CD = tcpvs.STORE_CD
AND tcpvs.VER_RECV_DT IS NOT NULL
AND tcpvs.VER_RECV_DT IS NULL
ORDER BY tcpvs.STORE_CD ASC, tcpvs.REG_DT DESC, tcpvs.VER_RECV_DT DESC
